abstrac: Very experienced journalist available for all your communications needs (newsletters, web content, PR etc)
bio:
I bring to your job my experience from working in busy Online and Broadcasting newsrooms, my solid editorial background, newsgathering experience in various countries, my digital fluency, entrepreneurial mentality and can-do approach.

I have worked in demanding online, TV, Radio and print environments for national and international Media organisations and B2B clients, such as the BBC, Eleftherotypia/enet, Accounting & Business, Estates Gazette, Metal Bulletin, Jane's Airport Review, Just-Drinks.com, Just-Food.com, Tobacco Journal International, SPC magazine and others.

In my career I have covered as a journalist and reporter many areas and major events such as the 2003 War in Iraq from Turkey, Kuwait and Iraq; the 2001 G8 Summit and demonstrations in Genoa; many EU Summits in the UK and Brussels and the unfolding Greek economic crisis from Athens.

I am available for freelance work on an hourly or contract basis.
Payments via direct bank transfer or PayPal.
My invoices are UK-based without VAT.

abstrac: A CPA who wants to put his expertise to work for you!
bio:
I am a Certified Public Accountant with over a decade of experience. What you can expect from me is open, honest, professional communication and the ability to leverage an experienced professional to further you business goals.

Although my rates may not be as rock-bottom as some, what you are getting is a licensed professional with experience and education.

I prefer to work from my home office if possible, and am very comfortable with working remotely and in the cloud. I find that most accounting and financial projects are well suited to my work being done after business hours with the work product waiting ready for you when you open up shop in the morning. Hourly rates are negotiable based on the project.

abstrac: Cisco, asa, firewall, bgp, mpls, vpn
bio:
I am a network consultant/engineer with more than 16 years experiences and a Cisco CCIE in RS/Security,HCIE RS, Fortinet Expert, SDWAN, Wireshark Expert for Network Audit. 

I'm working as independent network consultant/expert for some large Enterprise/ISP in France and Europe.

I'm looking for miscellaneous work in network design, implementation, and/or troubleshooting up to 30 hours/week. I am available on weekdays during US working hours  and also on weekend. 

I offer services from planning, through implementation up to acceptance testing stages. I work only remotely (SSH/RDP/VPN/Team viewer). My goal is to solve issues at hand quickly, precisely and without any delays. 

For your contact, my Skype ID is VULEVY (Hoang Vu NGUYEN)

services.title: Graphic Design
description: Brand Creation, Brand Strategy & Management, Identities, Press PDFs, Merch Design, Package Design, Hospitality & Restaurant Design

bio:
our designs are custom, our developments are hand-coded, our doughnuts are homemade, and our ingredients are local. we are virtual, digital/paperless, and mobile from the A to Downeast. our studio runs on carbon neutral servers and free trade coffee. 

we we believe in strong brands, clean design, and proper programming. we are a mac, linux/ubuntu, and windows friendly studio. all of our work is stringent in complying with the accessibility and web technology standards and naturally optimised for search engines.

working hours ~ flexible schedule, standard business hours 2PM to 2AM EST

communication ~ via hangouts or mobile, schedule on gcal

organisation ~ sharing via gdrive & dropbox 

payment terms ~ we are paperless, credit/debit/paypal

scope, scheduling & invoicing ~ the scope of the project is final with the approval of the proposal all additional work to be quoted separately. the project officially begins when the initial payment is processed. the final payment is due upon approval of the project prior to delivery.

support ~ all development projects include a 5 day warranty for basic support. maintenance bundles available or on an hourly basis.

abstrac: A Collective Of Worldwide Freelance Artists – Makes A Difference
bio:
The world’s artists are so engaging we thought we would send out a net so to speak and bring them to a central location and offer their creativity to the businesses that want it.

Of course, the only way to do that was to make that central location online. So, that’s what we’ve done and the results are staggering.

The global marketplace has quickly become the “backyard” of Activedia which acts much like a hub for freelance artists who provide provocative branding and engaging design.

An excellent resource for business in need of creative design for websites, video productions, advertising and graphics Activedia is quickly becoming the answer for many who want design that finds itself anything but status quo.

This way of going about advertising is about capturing potential.
